arts.ttl: Roy Keane verdict on Bruno Fernandes says it all after Man Utd earn huge Liverpool win
arts.sum: Manchester United legend Roy Keane has praised Bruno Fernandes for his role in the Red Devils' winner at Liverpool on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Liverpool leaves out Wirtz and Ekitike, Sesko not in Man United’s starting lineup
arts.sum: Liverpool and Manchester United both left big-money summer signings on the bench for their Premier League clash on Sunday. United named two of its summer signings — Matheus Cunha and Bryan Mbeumo — in attack, while new goalkeeper Senne Lammens got his second start for the club.

arts.ttl: Manchester United beats Liverpool 2-1 with Maguire’s late goal in big boost for Amorim
arts.sum: Harry Maguire’s header in the 84th minute sealed one of United’s most significant wins under coach Ruben Amorim and consigned Liverpool to a fourth straight defeat in all competitions. After nine painful years, and at the 11th time of asking, Manchester United ended its Anfield hoodoo with a 2-1 win against Premier League defending champion Liverpool on Sunday.

arts.ttl: How Ruben Amorim got one over Arne Slot with tactical sleight of hand: FIVE THINGS WE LEARNED from Man United's dramatic 2-1 win over Liverpool
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim has back-to-back wins in the Premier League for the first time in his 12 months in charge at Manchester United, and what a place to do it.

arts.ttl: Roy Keane red-faced after exposing Man Utd's 'weak link' before Liverpool win
arts.sum: Roy Keane picked out a 'weak link' in Manchester United's team in the build-up to their Premier League clash with Liverpool, but it was that player who scored the Red Devils' winning goal

arts.ttl: How 'dominant' Maguire helped Man Utd beat Liverpool
arts.sum: Match of the Day pundit Shay Given analyses Harry Maguire's dominance in Manchester United's 2-1 win over Liverpool in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Gary Neville makes bold Man Utd prediction after Liverpool as Ruben Amorim set clear target
arts.sum: Man Utd moved up to ninth in the Premier League table after their 2-1 win against Liverpool on Sunday, and Gary Neville believes a top six finish is possible this season

arts.ttl: Manchester United: Roy Keane reacts to 'huge win' as footage of Anfield dressing room celebrations emerges
arts.sum: Man Utd have finally win back-to-back Premier League games under Ruben Amorim

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher tells Arne Slot NOT to make Mohamed Salah a guaranteed starter as Gary Neville reveals the key sign which shows Anfield hero may be on the decline after Man Utd defeat
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher has warned Arne Slot that Mohamed Salah should no longer be an automatic starter for Liverpool after their 2-1 defeat by Manchester United at Anfield.

arts.ttl: PGMOL confirm why Bryan Mbeumo goal was allowed to stand despite Alexis Mac Allister head injury
arts.sum: Bryan Mbeumo fired Manchester United ahead after just two minutes at Anfield
